meanings.definition: Modify or create according to individual or personal specifications.
meanings.sent1: I like to customize my phone case with stickers and glitter.
meanings.sent2: She decided to customize her car by adding racing stripes.
meanings.sent3: The chef tried to customize the recipe by adding chocolate chips to the pasta.
meanings.sent4: He customized his outfit to stand out in the crowd like a colorful peacock.
meanings.sent5: The artist customized the mural with vibrant colors that caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: To make or alter to individual or personal specifications.
meanings.sent1: They will customize the furniture to fit perfectly in the small room.
meanings.sent2: We can customize the software to meet your specific needs.
meanings.sent3: The tailor had to customize the dress at the last minute for the fashion show.
meanings.sent4: She customized her speech to connect with the audience like a skilled storyteller.
meanings.sent5: He customized his bike with unique features that made it one of a kind.
